> Does this method still work?

templates are not a thing anymore so no

but the general idea still works

you need to add the **SigmaBinary {}** node to the secondary bodies of the two binary systems

you have to make sure that the "child" binary system is processed after the "parent" binary system, so (just to be on the safe side) you might want to use:

    	SigmaBinary	{		after = XXXXX	}

for the secondary of the "child binary" and replace XXXXX with the name of the secondary of the parent binary
